text: Sher-e-Bangla Medical College (SBMC), is a government medical school in Bangladesh, established in 1968. It is located in Barisal. ==History== Construction began on the college on 6 November 1964, at that time it was known as Barisal Medical College. ==Campus== There are three hostels for male students and two for the female students. Both male and female intern doctors have each one hostel for them. == Photo Gallery == Sher-e-Bangla Medical college.jpg|Sher-e-Bangla Medical college On Dipaboli night students of SBMC decorate Jamilur Rahman male students House(2013).jpg Three male students houses of SBMC.jpg Central Mosque of SBMC.jpg|The Central Mosque of SBMC on the bank of the pond ==References== Category:1960s establishments in Bangladesh Category:1968 establishments in Asia Category:Barisal Category:Colleges and universities in Bangladesh Category:Medical education
title: Sher-e-Bangla Medical College
